name: Routine Inc.
description:
The objective in this small VR puzzle game is to figure out how to get a robot, any robot, to the goal marked by green color. You can program the robots with your remote control. However, the catch is that the robots must follow the instruction sequence you see next to you. Your task is to determine which robot(s) should follow that sequence. If a robot finishes the sequence or cannot follow the next step, it stops and can be commanded to follow the sequence again from the beginning.

You need HTC Vive to play. Otherwise you will only see a black screen.
